name: Link on Sol
description: Link on Solana is a memecoin inspired by Chainlink running on the Solana blockchain. It pokes fun at the token's community's unease in the way of a new parody. The token is a parody of the original, to which it has no affiliation. It is built for laughs, community vibes, without the necessity of having a utility. It is built as a community-driven project as a playful nod to the link marines and its community.
